entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 23. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 6:01 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 6:01 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
